Jx.Compare

Extends: Jx.Object

Class that holds functions for doing comparison operations.  This class requires the mootools-more Date() extensions.

notes

Each function that does a comparison returns

0if equal.
1if the first value is greater that the second.
-1if the first value is less than the second.

Example

Summary
Jx.CompareExtends: Jx.Object
Functions
alphanumericCompare alphanumeric variables. 
numericCompares numbers
ignorecaseCompares to alphanumeric strings without regard to case.
currencyCompares to currency values.
dateCompares 2 date values (either a string or an object)
booleanCompares 2 bolean values

b)

banother value
